original: 北方大勢底定後，揮大軍南進，欲奪荊州，再擊孫權，一舉統一江東。於長坂擊敗劉備，促使孫劉聯軍對抗。
text: After the general trend of the north is set, he marches south with a large army in order to seize Jingzhou, and then hit Sun Quan to unify Jiangdong in one fell swoop. Yu Changban defeated Liu Bei, prompting the Sun Liu coalition forces to confront.
